## Chess.board() method

Returns an 2D array representation of the current position. Empty squares are represented by null.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
board(): (Piece | null)[][];
```
<b>Returns:</b>

([Piece](./chess.js.piece.md) \| null)\[\]\[\]
